ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > div > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(4) > section > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > main:nth-child(4) > section > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > section:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(24) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h2:nth-child(2)
